name: Sister’s (Sally – Our Favorite Sister) Fish
ingredients: Filet of sole (very thin - 2 pieces per person)
instructions: Wash fish with water dry with paper towel
In a bowl, beat eggs, pour some bread crumbs on a plate.
Dip fish in egg mixture, then into bread crumbs
Spray cookie sheet with Pam and place fish on it
Place fish in single layer on sheet
Slice tomatoes, onion, green pepper thin and place on top of fish. Add parmesan cheese, salt, and pepper
You can substitute cookie pan for heavy duty foil and cook on gas grill.
